Class ActionHandlerValidatorLinker

  • java.lang.Object

    Please use ActionHandlerValidatorLinker.

public class ActionHandlerValidatorLinker
extends Object
    This class links any registered ActionHandler and ActionValidator instances with the default ActionHandlerValidatorRegistry.
